attributes.action: Put a stop to the Government culture of lying to the electorate.
attributes.additional_details: A good example is the recent assertions about the Canadian/EU trade deal, which has taken 7 years and has resulted in an imperfect deal for the UK. Cameron would have us believe that a Post-Brexit deal would be slower and less perfect - but the reverse is certain to be the case, given that such a trade deal would have only two parties to accommodate instead of 29!
attributes.background: Over the last 20 years, the UK government has increasingly used lies, smear and spin in presenting its case. Voters are being systematically misled on a wide range of issues. Truth and honesty are being sacrificed in a disgusting series of Government-driven attempts to subvert democratic processes.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition with a specific action for the UK Government and Parliament to take.
